note.p: Death: Corney House, Chiswick, Middlesex (31 March 1806)

Career: Envoy to Russia (1764-1766); Ambassador to Russia (1767-1768); MP; Chief Secretary for Ireland (1768-1772); Governor, Caribbean Islands (1776-1784); Privy Councillor (1769); Governor, Madras (1784-1785); Ambassador to China (1792-1794); Governor, Cape of Good Hope
Honours: Kt 1764; KB 1772; Baron (Ireland) 1776; Earl and Viscount (Ireland) 1792; Baron (UK) 1796
References: J H Appleby, 'The founding of St Petersburg in the context of the Royal Society's relationship with Russia' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 273-284
